summary.span: 提供所有 ASP.NET 行動裝置控制項類別的基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for all ASP.NET mobile control classes.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作為所有 ASP.NET mobile 控制項的基底類別類別主要是包含所有控制項通用的樣式和內容資訊。As the base class for all ASP.NET mobile controls, the class primarily contains style and context information common to all controls. 如需有關樣式和內容資訊的詳細資訊，請參閱和類別。For more information about style and context information, see the and classes. > [!NOTE] > 因為這個類別衍生自 ASP.NET基底類別，所有基底類別屬性、 方法和事件可用於每個行動控制項。Because this class derives from the ASP.NET base class, all base class properties, methods, and events are available in each of the mobile controls.

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

related.span: 在 ASP.NET Mobile 控制項

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當表單包含啟動另一個表單，而不需要從伺服器互動的瀏覽項目時，則會視為連結的表單。When a form contains navigation elements that activate another form without interaction from the server, it is considered a linked form. 有幾項條件，才會被視為表單連結。There are several criteria for a form to be considered linked. 比方說，如果下列三個條件都符合，表單 B 會被視為連結至表單：For example, if the following three conditions are met, Form B is considered to be linked to Form A: - 包含表單的與表單 B.作為其目的地Form A contains a with its destination as Form B. - 表單的不包含事件處理常式。Form A does not contain an event handler. - 表單 B 沒有事件處理常式。Form B has no event handler. 基底實作不做任何動作，但其他控制項，例如，覆寫的預設實作。The base implementation does nothing, but other controls, such as the , override the default implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不像其他屬性，屬性不繼承自其父代。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如，如果您設定青色父控制項，子控制項上的屬性將不會繼承青色的背景色彩; 您必須明確設定子控制項的青色、 或您的屬性必須設定屬性父控制項，並套用至子控制項的樣式表。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit a background color of cyan; you must explicitly set the child control's property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 這是與階層式樣式表的行為一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 未設定這個屬性為`true`上控制項。Do not set this property to `true` on a control. 如果您將這個屬性設定為`true`，控制項將會擲回例外狀況。If you set this property to `true`, the control will throw an exception. 這個屬性會忽略尾端分行符號毫無意義的控制項。This property is ignored by controls for which a trailing break does not make sense. 下表列出支援的控制項對特定種類的裝置屬性。The following table lists the controls that support the property for certain kinds of devices. 下表顯示支援的裝置類型的控制項屬性。The following table shows the controls with the types of devices that support the property. 請洽裝置製造商，以判斷這個屬性的效果，在其裝置上。Check with device manufacturers to determine the effects of this property on their devices. |控制項Control|使用 HTML 瀏覽器的裝置Device With HTML Browser|以 WML 瀏覽器的裝置Device With WML Browser|WML/瀏覽器的裝置Device with WML/UP Browser| |-------------|------------------------------|-----------------------------|---------------------------------| |`AdRotator`|||| |`Calendar`|[是]Yes||| |`Command`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|| |`Image`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|[是]Yes| |`Label`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|[是]Yes| |`Link`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|| |`List`|||| |`ObjectList`|是 （除非裝置的瀏覽器可以處理資料表）Yes (unless device's browser can handle tables)||| |`Panel` （預設值為 false）`Panel` (default is false)|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|[是]Yes| |`PhoneCall`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|| |`SelectionList`|是 （除非瀏覽器可以處理資料表）Yes (Unless browser can handle tables)|[是]Yes|| |`TextBox`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|| |`TextView`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|| |`TextViewElement`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|| |`Validator`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會通知伺服器控制項，它應該執行通用的每個 HTTP 要求的動作，例如設定資料庫查詢相關聯的頁面。This method notifies the server control that it should perform actions common to each HTTP request for the page it is associated with, such as setting up a database query. 在頁面生命週期中的這個階段，建立並初始化伺服器控制項階層架構中的，還原檢視狀態，和表單控制項反映用戶端資料。At this stage in the page lifecycle, server controls in the hierarchy are created and initialized, view state is restored, and form controls reflect client-side data. 使用屬性來判斷是否在回應用戶端回傳，載入頁面，或如果它正在載入與存取第一次。Use the property to determine whether the page is being loaded in response to a client postback, or if it is being loaded and accessed for the first time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您有連結格式的"#form1"中的使用者控制項中所包含的控制項，這個方法會尋找表單`id=form1`使用者控制項中。If you have a link of the format "#form1" in a control contained in a user control, this method looks for a form with `id=form1` in the user control. 如果找不到，它會增加任何巢狀的使用者控制項的鏈結，並再搜尋頁面上的表單。If not found, it goes up the chain of any nested user controls, and then searches for the form on the page. > [!NOTE] > 範圍規則查核向上移動，而不會往下，鏈結。Scoping rules walk up, not down, the chain. 如果您想要瀏覽至包含在使用者控制項的表單，您必須使用 「: 」 所使用的語法方法參考表單。If you want to browse to a form that is contained in a user control, you must use the ":" syntax used by method to refer to the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫這個方法，以儲存私用檢視狀態。You can override this method to store a private view state. 與一般的檢視狀態儲存的資訊，除了 ASP.NET mobile Web Form 會儲存資訊，例如表單分頁。In addition to information saved with the ordinary view state, ASP.NET mobile Web Forms store information such as whether or not the form is paginated. 這會加入資訊會儲存在私用檢視狀態，並儲存在用戶端，而不是在伺服器上。This added information is stored in the private view state and is stored on the client rather than the server. 私用檢視狀態會以最佳化方式儲存。A private view state is saved in an optimized manner. 預設行為，例如進行第一種形式的作用中的表單中，永遠不會包含在儲存的私用檢視狀態。Default behavior, such as making the first form the active form, is never included in the saved private view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表包含的定義列舉型別。The following table contains the definitions of the enumeration. |列舉Enumerations|值Value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|00|沒有大小設為指定的物件。No size is set for the specified object. 這是預設值。This is the default value.| |`Wrap`|11|換行至下一行。Wrap to the next line.| |`NoWrap`|22|文字不換行至下一行。The text is not wrapped to the next line.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，藉由設定`FirstForm`屬性，根據瀏覽器的功能。The following example demonstrates how to use the property by setting the `FirstForm` property based on the capabilities of the browser. 此程式碼範例是針對較大範例的一部分屬性。This code sample is part of a larger example for the property.
